string.name: aimAtBase
string.font: "Aim at the base\n and tap the screen."

string.name: heightHint
string.font: "Aim at the top\n and tap the screen."

string.name: aimAtTop
string.font: "Aim at the top\n and read the height."

string.name: measureHint
string.font: "Type the lens height\n or click on Measure."

resources.string:
"Input distances in the same units.
 Enter lens height from ground.
Then enter/measure distance
 to the base of the object."
